name: AHLC
description:
We bring together our consulting insights, theoretical frameworks, and capability-building expertise to create highly-specialized learning and certification journeys for HR professionals.

We exist to shape decisions for the better—to protect and enrich the lives of people around the world. Our colleagues provide our clients in over 120 countries with advice and solutions that give them the clarity and confidence to make better decisions to protect and grow their business.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Level-up HR with Specialised Learning
ShortDescription: AHLC provides application-based learning to help HR, people managers and business leaders impact business outcomes.

Highlights.name: Human Resource Consulting Services
Highlights.description: Aon is the global leader in human resource consulting. We partner with your organisation to measure, design, develop and deliver strategies to help you achieve business and results.

Highlights.name: Human Resource Data and Benchmarking
Highlights.description: Aon's leading research delivers analysis and fact-based into all areas of HR Management.  Our extensive data and benchmarking capabilities can help you gain a holistic understanding of how your organisation compares with others in the market.

Highlights.name: Total Rewards Strategy
Highlights.description: With the changing business sentiment, compensation budgets have seen an increase for India Inc. and so have employee expectations. However, cost optimisation and focus on performance still remain India Inc's top focus areas.

enhanced_description: AHLC, a service offering by Aon, provides highly specialized, application-based learning and certification journeys designed for HR professionals, people managers, and business leaders. Its primary objective is to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency, enabling clients to drive and impact business outcomes. Beyond its core learning and development offerings, AHLC delivers comprehensive human resource consulting services, encompassing human resource data and benchmarking capabilities, and expert design of compensation strategies, including Total Rewards Strategy. The company leverages its consulting insights and theoretical frameworks to provide clarity and confidence for better decision-making, serving clients globally across over 120 countries, with specific expertise in markets such as India Inc.
